abstract: The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China and Bank of China, two of the top Chinese lenders, signaled a peaking of earnings growth after strong second-quarter profits, as they slow their lending and focus on asset quality.
snippet: The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China and Bank of China, two of the top Chinese lenders, signaled a peaking of earnings growth after strong second-quarter profits, as they slow their lending and focus on asset quality.
lead_paragraph: The Industrial and Commercial Bank of China and Bank of China, two of the top Chinese lenders, signaled a peaking of earnings growth after strong second-quarter profits, as they slow their lending and focus on asset quality.

headline.main: I.C.B.C. and BOC Set for Slower Growth

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
